title: Justin and Hailey Bieber strip down for Calvin Klein and we are living
text:
And the award for best looking couple goes to… (Picture: Calvin Klein)

Justin and Hailey Bieber have teamed up and stripped down to their underwear for Calvin Klein.

The couple, who just had their second wedding, celebrated 50 years of the brand with adorable poses together.

Hailey and Justin were joined by Kendall Jenner and A$AP Rocky for the campaign, and boy did they all look good doing it.

Calvin Klein’s campaign included a video which had them watching an old school TV together as they cuddled up on their old fashioned sofa.

Another scene saw the newlyweds dancing and jumping around before the singer picked his wife up and threw her over his shoulder. He’s stronger than he looks.

The Biebers were joined by Kendall Jenner and A$AP Rocky for the campaign (Picture: Calvin Klein)

Kendall – along with Kylie Jenner, Jaden Smith and Scooter Braun – also attended the Biebers’ second wedding in South Carolina.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Over 150 guests attended the event at the 20,000 acre resort where rooms apparently cost $1,000 (£800) a night.

Money obviously an issue in their luscious lives as Justin recently shared the scratch Hailey caused on his Lamborghini.

Hailey managed to scratch the wheels of Justin’s pink Lamborghini, however, luckily, he doesn’t seem to be too fussed by the whole ordeal.

In fact, he decided to take the opportunity to joke about it. Taking to Instagram stories, the singer shared a series of videos as he playfully moaned at his wife for ruining his vehicle.‘What did you do? What did you do?’ he questioned.

Hailey subsequently apologised, as she stressed that she could ‘fix’ the problem while looking down at the damage done to which her partner cheekily responded: ‘Dang, you’re freaking cute, and you’ve got pigtails’, as he played with her hair.

Adorable (Picture: Calvin Klein)

‘It’s a bad scratch,’ Hailey reassured her husband.

It must feel great to be able to accidentally scratch somebody’s Lamborghini and not worry about paying the person a worrying amount of money.

We doubt Justin will ever get mad at Hailey considering how in love the two are.
